intro:
If you own or buy Frederic: Resurrection of Music, Sparkle 2 EVO, or Qbik, you can save 50% off this title!

Dragged by her parents, a young and rebellious teenage girl – Violett, moves to an old spooky house in the middle of nowhere. Forced away from her friends and life in the city; she imagines how boring life in the countryside will be: spending day after day, bored in her room with absolutely nothing to do. But what she cannot imagine, is that in just a few moments, she'll have the adventure of her life.
